Nightlight/Windlord/Perceptor:

"When we find out what is goin on could be too late..."said grimly the 
femme, she walked away ; reluctanty she left the room  and quikly hide well 
close of the Bridge, hoping to heard something that let her get something 
that clear her what is going on. Something was happening and she had the 
feeling that Leo Prime and Lord Elder didnt like to told her. After that she 
would move towards an empty quaters, she didnt know where was her place in 
the ark, no time to took one since she has arrived. she didnt like to admit 
that she felt slighty tired and
also she needed to sit down and think what to do next.

******************************
"She's starting show the craws" commented Perceptor "It was time"

"Do you have something to do with that Perceptor?" said Windlord, who 
arrived shortly after Nightligh left

"I didnt have any hand in what happened here... or with Rodimus"replied 
camly


-----Mensaje original-----
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, August 15, 2011 12:54 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Nightmares . . .

> <OLD - Nightlight>
>
> "I wont rest till my family is back and safe"said firmy Nighlight whose 
> was
> tired to see every single of her loved one corrupted or menaced "I'll do
> whatever it takes to do it... Whatever it takes."
>
> Nightlight was surpriced by her own new found courage, but she was tired 
> to
> feel defendless and tired to hide... Maybe it was time to fight back.
>
> Perceptor walked around and watched the scene

<NEW>

LEO PRIME glanced up as PERCEPTOR walked into the room, his optics
curious and cuatious, but then he looked back at NIGHTLIGHT a smile
appearing on his face. "No one can do anything until we get some
answers."

There was a nod from LORD ELDER, "Maybe once we find out something we
can come get you?"

(TAG)

Preston
